titleStmt.title: Animadversion upon Generall Monck's letter to the gentry of Devon: wherein his arguments for anarchy are considered, and the weaknesse of his Harringtonian principle detected. By M. W.
titleStmt.author: Morice, William, Sir, 1602-1676.

notesStmt.note: M. W. = Sir William Morice; cf. Wing.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Feb: 3."; "oris" is inserted after the "M" on the title page, and "illiam" is written in after the "W", as are the numbers 2 and 1 reversing the order of the names.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
